title: Is there any Roman typeface that had been influenced by the style of Asian typeface?
content: Is there any Roman typeface that had been influenced by the style of Asian typeface?
author: Siyang

comments.content:
[IHOF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307095332/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/) have some Asian-influenced typefaces available.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---

There are some that are more pen-drawn styles, like [ITC Kendo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307095332/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/kendo-itc/), but is this answering your question? There are also the cartoonish Asian stereotype fonts like [Kanban](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307095332/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/kanban/).

Could you be more specific about what you are looking for?

- Mike Yanega
